verses.verse: וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And I said שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> I pray you O heads יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּקְצִינֵ֖י <S%H7101><s%> and ye princes בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לָכֶ֔ם לָדַ֖עַת <S%H3045><s%> [Is it] not for you to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> adversary

שֹׂ֥נְאֵי <S%H8130><s%> Who hate ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> the good וְאֹ֣הֲבֵי <S%H157><s%> and love [רָעָה כ] (רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity ק) גֹּזְלֵ֤י <S%H1497><s%> who pluck off עוֹרָם֙ <S%H5785><s%> their skin מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וּשְׁאֵרָ֖ם <S%H7607><s%> from off them and their flesh מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from עַצְמוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6106><s%> from off their bones

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Who אָכְלוּ֮ <S%H398><s%> Who also eat שְׁאֵ֣ר <S%H7607><s%> the flesh עַמִּי֒ <S%H5971><s%> of my people וְעוֹרָם֙ <S%H5785><s%> their skin מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> and הִפְשִׁ֔יטוּ <S%H6584><s%> and flay וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמֹֽתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6106><s%> their bones פִּצֵּ֑חוּ <S%H6476><s%> from off them and they break וּפָרְשׂוּ֙ <S%H6566><s%> and chop them in pieces כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Who בַּסִּ֔יר <S%H5518><s%> as for the pot וּכְבָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> and as flesh בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within קַלָּֽחַת׃ <S%H7037><s%> the caldron

אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִזְעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> Then shall they cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יַעֲנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> but he will not hear אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְיַסְתֵּ֨ר <S%H5641><s%> them he will even hide פָּנָ֤יו <S%H6440><s%> his face מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> that בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> from them at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Because הֵרֵ֖עוּ <S%H7489><s%> as they have behaved themselves ill מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> in their doings פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> concerning the prophets הַמַּתְעִ֣ים <S%H8582><s%> err אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> that make my people הַנֹּשְׁכִ֤ים <S%H5391><s%> that bite בְּשִׁנֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H8127><s%> with their teeth וְקָרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> and cry שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and he that putteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> not into their mouths וְקִדְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H6942><s%> they even prepare עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> concerning מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> war

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore לַ֤יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Therefore night לָכֶם֙ מֵֽחָז֔וֹן <S%H2377><s%> [shall be] unto you that ye shall not have a vision וְחָשְׁכָ֥ה <S%H2821><s%> be black לָכֶ֖ם מִקְּסֹ֑ם <S%H7080><s%> unto you that ye shall not divine וּבָ֤אָה <S%H935><s%> shall go down הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> and the sun עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> over the prophets וְקָדַ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> shall be dark עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> and the day

וּבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed הַחֹזִ֗ים <S%H2374><s%> Then shall the seers וְחָֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H2659><s%> confounded הַקֹּ֣סְמִ֔ים <S%H7080><s%> and the diviners וְעָט֥וּ <S%H5844><s%> yea they shall all cover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׂפָ֖ם <S%H8222><s%> their lips כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> will all כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַעֲנֵ֖ה <S%H4617><s%> for [there is] no answer אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> But truly אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I מָלֵ֤אתִי <S%H4390><s%> I am full כֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H3581><s%> of power אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> by the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> and of judgment וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> and of might לְהַגִּ֤יד <S%H5046><s%> to declare לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <S%H6588><s%> his transgression וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and to Israel חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2403><s%> his sin ס

שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Now זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> this I pray you ye heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּקְצִינֵ֖י <S%H7101><s%> and princes בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַֽמֲתַעֲבִ֣ים <S%H8581><s%> that abhor מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything הַיְשָׁרָ֖ה <S%H3477><s%> all equity יְעַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6140><s%> and pervert
בֹּנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> They build up צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion בְּדָמִ֑ים <S%H1818><s%> with blood וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem בְּעַוְלָֽה׃ <S%H5766><s%> with iniquity

רָאשֶׁ֣יהָ ׀ <S%H7218><s%> The heads בְּשֹׁ֣חַד <S%H7810><s%> for reward יִשְׁפֹּ֗טוּ <S%H8199><s%> thereof judge וְכֹהֲנֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests בִּמְחִ֣יר <S%H4242><s%> for hire יוֹר֔וּ <S%H3384><s%> thereof teach וּנְבִיאֶ֖יהָ <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets בְּכֶ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money יִקְסֹ֑מוּ <S%H7080><s%> thereof divine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD יִשָּׁעֵ֣נוּ <S%H8172><s%> yet will they lean לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and say הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> is not יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [Is] not the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <S%H7130><s%> among לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> can come עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> us? none evil

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore בִּגְלַלְכֶ֔ם <S%H1558><s%> for your sake צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Therefore shall Zion שָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> [as] a field תֵֽחָרֵ֑שׁ <S%H2790><s%> be plowed וִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem עִיִּ֣ין <S%H5856><s%> shall become heaps תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וְהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לְבָמ֥וֹת <S%H1116><s%> as the high places יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of the forest פ
